overview: Have you ever wished you had a little something to attract the guys you really wanted? An aphrodisiac cologne, a magic potion, or Cupid's Arrows? Well, true to our theme, Brandon show you how much fun you could have when he finds a Snake Charmer's flute and charms the pants off the boyz he meets. These eight smooth Cobraboyz really turn up the heat and whether they are indoors or out, the action is very passionate and real. Now things aren't always what they seem, and the ending will suprise you, but I guess you'll just have to see it for yourself.
title: Charmed
